channel.title: [562] Custom text on Quest tab? [RS2HD]

item.title: [562] Custom text on Quest tab? [RS2HD]
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
item.description:
@aekramer wrote:

I know its possible to get custom text in the quest tab, with sendString and also in the client, but I just cant figure out where to put it? If anyone knows PLEASE POST!

This is my sendString (it originally came from a 508, but I converted it)

[code]
for(int i = 0; i < 142; i++)
{
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=305AFF><shad=0202>lRoyal in Runel", 274, 5);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=A35502><shad=0202>lDungeoneeringl", 274, 6);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=A35502>Dungeon:.", 274, 7);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=A35502>Dung Instructions", 274, 8);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=A35502>Train Dungeoneering", 274, 9);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=3B62FF>lTeleportsl", 274, 10);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Home", 274, 11);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Barrows", 274, 12);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Clan Wars", 274, 13);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Castle Wars", 274, 14);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Bounty Hunter", 274, 15);

player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Bandits", 274, 17);

player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Elf Zone", 274, 20);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Tokkul Wars", 274, 21);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Train", 274, 22);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Train 2", 274, 23);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Train 3", 274, 24);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=3B62FF>Teleports 2", 274, 25);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Train 4", 274, 26);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Bandos", 274, 131);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Saradomin", 274, 140);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Armadyl", 274, 136);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Zamorak", 274, 27);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Grand Exchange", 274, 28);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Edgeville", 274, 29);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Mutant Tarn", 274, 30);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Green Dragons", 274, 141);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Party", 274, 31);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>TzTok-Jad", 274, 125);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>King Black Dragon", 274, 32);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Kalphite Lair", 274, 34);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Pest Control", 274, 35);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Mage Bank", 274, 138);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=B800B8>Spirit Beast", 274, 37);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=3B62FF>l~Quests~l", 274, 39);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<col=3B62FF>l~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~l", 274, 41);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<img=0><col=B800B8> You are currently in: <img=0>", 274, 43);
player.getActionSender().sendString("<img=1><col=B800B8><shad=0202> World 2 <img=1>", 274, 44);
player.getActionSender().sendString("", 274, 9+i);

			}[/code]

Thx in advance
